PackageOracle.name: DA_ACCOUNT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT
/* Generated on 28-MAY-15 12.59.47.644346000 AM -05:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,dunning_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_num IN VARCHAR2
,account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,account_open_dt IN DATE
,account_close_dt IN DATE
,account_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_purpose_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,subaccount_ind IN NUMBER
,account_qualifier_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,dunning_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_num IN VARCHAR2
,account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,account_open_dt IN DATE
,account_close_dt IN DATE
,account_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_purpose_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,subaccount_ind IN NUMBER
,account_qualifier_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,dunning_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_num IN VARCHAR2
,account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,account_open_dt IN DATE
,account_close_dt IN DATE
,account_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_purpose_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,subaccount_ind IN NUMBER
,account_qualifier_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_account;

body.name: DA_ACCOUNT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT
/* Generated on 28-MAY-15 12.59.47.829917000 AM -05:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,dunning_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_num IN VARCHAR2
,account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,account_open_dt IN DATE
,account_close_dt IN DATE
,account_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_purpose_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,subaccount_ind IN NUMBER
,account_qualifier_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account.add(fx), parms=' || dunning_group_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || account_num || '|' || account_nm || '|' || account_open_dt || '|' || account_close_dt || '|' || account_type_cd || '|' || account_purpose_subtype_cd || '|' || subaccount_ind || '|' || account_qualifier_cd || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account a
(
a.dunning_group_cd
,a.account_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.account_num
,a.account_nm
,a.account_open_dt
,a.account_close_dt
,a.account_type_cd
,a.account_purpose_subtype_cd
,a.subaccount_ind
,a.account_qualifier_cd
,a.billing_station_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.dunning_group_cd
,chtr.s_account_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.account_num
,add.account_nm
,add.account_open_dt
,add.account_close_dt
,add.account_type_cd
,add.account_purpose_subtype_cd
,add.subaccount_ind
,add.account_qualifier_cd
,add.billing_station_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.account_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,dunning_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_num IN VARCHAR2
,account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,account_open_dt IN DATE
,account_close_dt IN DATE
,account_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_purpose_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,subaccount_ind IN NUMBER
,account_qualifier_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account.add, parms=' || dunning_group_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || account_num || '|' || account_nm || '|' || account_open_dt || '|' || account_close_dt || '|' || account_type_cd || '|' || account_purpose_subtype_cd || '|' || subaccount_ind || '|' || account_qualifier_cd || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account a
(
a.dunning_group_cd
,a.account_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.account_num
,a.account_nm
,a.account_open_dt
,a.account_close_dt
,a.account_type_cd
,a.account_purpose_subtype_cd
,a.subaccount_ind
,a.account_qualifier_cd
,a.billing_station_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.dunning_group_cd
,chtr.s_account_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.account_num
,add.account_nm
,add.account_open_dt
,add.account_close_dt
,add.account_type_cd
,add.account_purpose_subtype_cd
,add.subaccount_ind
,add.account_qualifier_cd
,add.billing_station_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,dunning_group_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_num IN VARCHAR2
,account_nm IN VARCHAR2
,account_open_dt IN DATE
,account_close_dt IN DATE
,account_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_purpose_subtype_cd IN VARCHAR2
,subaccount_ind IN NUMBER
,account_qualifier_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account.add, parms=' || dunning_group_cd || '|' || account_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || account_num || '|' || account_nm || '|' || account_open_dt || '|' || account_close_dt || '|' || account_type_cd || '|' || account_purpose_subtype_cd || '|' || subaccount_ind || '|' || account_qualifier_cd || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account a
(
a.dunning_group_cd
,a.account_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.account_num
,a.account_nm
,a.account_open_dt
,a.account_close_dt
,a.account_type_cd
,a.account_purpose_subtype_cd
,a.subaccount_ind
,a.account_qualifier_cd
,a.billing_station_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.dunning_group_cd
,add.account_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.account_num
,add.account_nm
,add.account_open_dt
,add.account_close_dt
,add.account_type_cd
,add.account_purpose_subtype_cd
,add.subaccount_ind
,add.account_qualifier_cd
,add.billing_station_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account.del, parms=' || account_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_account a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.account_id = del.account_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account.del');

END del;

END da_account;
